qa_pairs.question: How you doing?
qa_pairs.answer: Doing well, doing well. How about you?

qa_pairs.question: Oh, what is that? Can you elaborate on what that is, Grayman?
qa_pairs.answer: I don't know fully. I wish he were here to explain it because he'd do a better job. But in essence, it's sort of a scavenger hunt type deal where you solve three problems, probably with the help of AI. And if you manage to solve them for each one, you get a few of the keywords from an ergo wallet that currently contains 200 ERG.

qa_pairs.question: This is pretty cool. Did he start this in the last Ergo hack? Was that what this is?
qa_pairs.answer: Yes. And unfortunately, he was right about to release it. And it turns out that he discovered that there were some ways to kind of cheat it. And so he called it off and said, let me get my hack together.

qa_pairs.question: Grayman, you were talking about joining the network as well weren't you at some point?
qa_pairs.answer: I can't use one of my customers fiber lines for this purpose. I'd have to get my own and I live out in the county. So it's coming my way. But apparently the company that was going to roll it out here got bought out by T-Mobile. So God knows how long it's going to take.

qa_pairs.question: You don't want to run a node off a cell connection?
qa_pairs.answer: It's cable, but it's asymmetric. So the upload speed is just too slow to support. I don't want to join and be a worthless limping piece.

qa_pairs.question: So Richi, what are the current plans?
qa_pairs.answer: Yeah, hello. Can you hear me? Yeah, thank you. So the current plans are to have a large event called CLB, which was presented in Ergo Hack 9. So as long as we sort out the technical part, and we understand that there will be no basically delays launching the coin or maybe we can even mint some coins but just don't activate the smart contract or don't activate the off-chain part whatever just waiting for the initial bootstrap event.

qa_pairs.question: What will be the order of magnitude of the amount of ERG that is required to be part of these liquidity provisions to get one of these tokens?
qa_pairs.answer: Right, so there will always be 100 tokens. It depends how many are collected. My goal would be to collect around 300,000 to 400,000. So one token will be worth, so you can just divide it by 100, right? So if we collect 300,000 ERGs, so one token would be worth 3,000, right? So 3,000 ERGs would be one token.

qa_pairs.question: What is my incentive? Do I make additional earnings on these tokens if I get one of these?
qa_pairs.answer: Yes, that's a good question. So what you will get if you participate? So first of all, you will get CLB token, which will be representing your part of your contribution. Anyway, after that, you'll get some airdrops from our partners additional as a bonus. And then your liquidity pool is bootstrapped with 0.3% fee. So during these two years, all the fees will be accumulated for all the people who will be trading USE tokens with ERGs back and forth.

qa_pairs.question: So after two years, what happens? These tokens still exist and you still get rewards based on them? I'm still not getting it. What's my incentive to be one of the initial liquidity providers if I can just buy these tokens on the secondary market in one and a half years?
qa_pairs.answer: So after the second year, when you construct liquidity, you get liquidity tokens like LP tokens. These LP tokens will be locked in a redeemed smart contract with CLB tokens for two years. So after two years, the smart contract will unlock the redeem function. So you will be able to exchange your CLB token to liquidity token and after that, conventionally remove liquidity from liquidity pool.

qa_pairs.question: And is that just done by like a database that you have a list of wallets that contributed and ignores the tokens that are in people's wallets that they might have purchased from the secondary market?
qa_pairs.answer: Well, people can purchase tokens from the secondary market. It means someone sold it. Did they get the air drops? Yes, so if you contribute ERGs during the initial bootstrap, you will get Airdrop and the CLB token. After that, CLB token will be traded on the secondary market.

qa_pairs.question: So I'm too dumb to chase quick profits. But I do wonder, like, so after the two years are up, then this thing unlocks. And at that point, is there any purpose left to these original tokens? Or does everything just become normal liquidity provisions in the DEX?
qa_pairs.answer: No, these tokens, so this contract will exist forever, right? The redemption contract. So you can redeem the portion of liquidity pool of liquidity tokens and then redeem liquidity or you just can keep these tokens in your wallet for 10 years and just accumulate fees. Your LP tokens will be locked in the original USE LP liquidity pool and they will stay there until you decide to redeem them.

qa_pairs.question: How does it sound, Richi?
qa_pairs.answer: So next week is busy because we have a Cardano Summit and then some traveling.

qa_pairs.answer: So, launch will be done with MewFinance. So, we already, actually, since ErgoHack 9, it's almost one year since we did this presentation, ErgoHack 9, I encourage everyone to go and just go to Ergo YouTube channel, and look at the ErgoHack 9. I explain how this launch will work. The video is there. And I'll be publishing more papers on that. So the basis is already done, everything for the launch.
